name: Samus Aran - Metroid
description:
I know, there's already a Samus LoRA. Well here's another one!

Using <lora:samus:0.5> seems to be the sweet spot.
Her mole is hit or miss but, if you bump <lora:samus:#> up to 0.6 or 0.7, it shows up more consistently; at the cost of slightly less defined lips and eyes.

Share what you make! I'd love to see it!

You can get some pretty realistic looking results, depending on your tags (obviously). Also, the Zero Suit seems to render accurately in most of my testing. Just use the (zero suit) tag.

Her Paralyzer gun was in the training data. Using (gun) gets you in the ballpark, but I just can't seem to get weapons to render accurately. You may have better luck with some experimentation.
